page.title: 13LLANGADOG-THE MART
page.content: A livestock mart is held in the village of Llangadog every other Tuesday.The mart is for the sale of sheep and lambs except for the Xmas mart,when cattle are also sold there. The mart ground is between the Red Lion Hotel and Rhydyfro Council Housing Estate.Repair work is being done at the present time at the mart ground with new gates and fences being erected.The number of sheep and lambs at the mart varies from about 700 to 1,500.The animals are weighed on arrival and then placed in pens until the auction starts at 11.00 a.m. The auctioneer is from Llandovery,a town 6 miles from Llangadog.Many farmers in the area bring their animals to the mart in pick up vans,horseboxes, landrovers and lorries.
